artist: Artist: Joe Tilson; Publisher: Waddington Graphics, London
classification: Prints; Collages / Assemblages; Works on Paper
description: orange ground with eight by eight grid of squares in red, each with the word "SUN" in stenciled red letters; piece of twine attached at top center with a silver metal button-like clip and attached at bottom left with square of metal with red pigments surrounding punched-out stencil letters spelling "SUN"; linearly-drawn copy of metal square to right; notes and marks in print in lower corners in red and orange
image_copyright: © Joe Tilson %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
markings:
LLC, in pencil: 24/75
LRC,publisher\'s blindstamp: WG (inside rectangle)
medium: Color soft-ground etching and aquatint with collage of stencil plate, string, and aluminum pin
provenance: Dolly J. Fiterman, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2016.
title: Sun Mantra
